org.opentosca.toscana.plugins.cloudformation

Class CloudFormationFileCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opentosca.toscana.plugins.cloudformation.CloudFormationFileCreator

  • public class CloudFormationFileCreator
extends java.lang.Object
    Builds scripts and copies files needed for the deployment of the CloudFormation template.
    See Also:
    CloudFormation, S3 Storage, AWS CLI

    • Constructor Detail

      • CloudFormationFileCreator

        public CloudFormationFileCreator(TransformationContext context,
                                 CloudFormationModule cfnModule)
        Creates a CloudFormationFileCreator in order to build deployment scripts and copy files.
        Parameters:
        context - TransformationContext to extract topology and logger
        cfnModule - CloudFormationModule to get the necessary CloudFormation information

    • Method Detail

      • copyFiles

        public void copyFiles()
        Copies all files that need to be uploaded to the target artifact.

      • writeScripts

        public void writeScripts()
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Creates all Scripts necessary for AWS CloudFormation deployment.
        Uses the BashScript implementation for the scripts.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • copyUtilScripts

        public void copyUtilScripts()
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Copies all needed CloudFormation utility scripts into the target artifact.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if scripts cannot be found

      • copyUtilDependencies

        public void copyUtilDependencies()
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Copies all needed CloudFormation utility files to the target artifact. Note: Theses are the files that actually need to be uploaded and accessed by EC2 instances unlike the util scripts.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeReadme

        public void writeReadme(TransformationContext context)
        Writes the readme
